argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | prmirred.i | |- I = ( Irred ` ZZring ) |
| 2 |  | #P_prmnn | |- ( x e. Prime -> x e. NN ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_prmirredlem | |- ( x e. NN -> ( x e. I <-> x e. Prime ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_bicomd | |- ( x e. NN -> ( x e. Prime <-> x e. I ) ) |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_biadan2 | |- ( x e. Prime <-> ( x e. NN /\ x e. I ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_elin | |- ( x e. ( NN i^i I ) <-> ( x e. NN /\ x e. I ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_bitr4i | |- ( x e. Prime <-> x e. ( NN i^i I ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_eqriv | |- Prime = ( NN i^i I ) |
